title: Display contact number in booking interface

requirements.text: Add a contact information section to the Layout header that displays the business phone number prominently, visible on all pages

quotes: Ok lekin hamara number bhi dalo es me

acceptanceCriteria: Contact phone number is displayed in the header or footer of the application
Phone number is clearly visible and formatted for easy reading
Number remains accessible on all pages of the application

constraints: Do not modify existing booking form phone field
Do not change the backend schema or data model
